Apps.AMZ: Maximize your sales with our app, seamlessly connecting your Shopify store to Amazon through a one-click Buy button.
Apps.AnnBar: Boost your store's engagement with an announcement bar! Easily display important messages, promotions, and discounts to your customers.
Apps.Sticky: Improve your merchant's customer experience by allowing them to easily add items to their cart from anywhere on the product page.
Apps.Upsell: Increase your average order value effortlessly! Suggest complementary products at any purchase stage and watch your sales grow.
Apps.title: Apps worth trying out

Feedback.text1: We're a small team at Libautech, and your feedback helps us grow and support businesses like yours. If you have a moment, please share your experience!
Feedback.text2: Thank you so much for your amazing 5-star review! Your support means the world to us. Would you mind sharing your experience on the Shopify App Store to help others discover us?
Feedback.text3: We're truly sorry your experience wasn't what you hoped for. Please share what went wrong‚Äîwe're committed to making it right!
Feedback.title: Leave a review

Help.scheduleBody: Schedule a Zoom meeting for help with widget styling, positioning, cart drawer integration or any other queries.
Help.step: Step-by-step video guides to help you succeed
Help.wt1Body: Follow this guide to install and configure the Smart Upsell app for seamless upselling and increased sales.
Help.wt1Title: How to Set Up the Smart Upsell App
Help.wt2Body: Boost your sales with AI-powered upsell offers on Shopify! In this tutorial, we'll walk you through the process of setting up personalized AI upsell offers to increase your store's revenue and improve customer satisfaction.
Help.wt2Title: How to Create High-Converting Popup Upsells
Help.wt3Title: Add Upsells to Your Cart Drawer

InfoCard.Description: Managing multiple apps can be expensive and time-consuming. With the Libautech package, you get all our premium tools in one simple subscription for just $9.99/month, plus, enjoy a 7-day free trial to experience the full benefits risk-free.

LegacyBanner.description: We have developed a new version of the Announcement Bar app, which offers better performance and supports Shopify's newest standard While we are excited about this, it also means that to use this version, you will need to delete the old bars and create new ones. With this update, it is no longer possible to create new bars using the old version.
LegacyBanner.title: Legacy User Warning

analyticsDesc: Gain insights into your upsell performance with detailed analytics. Track views, clicks, conversions, and revenue impact to optimize your strategies.

important: Get instant support through chat or browse our comprehensive help documentation

settingsDesc: Customize your upsell experience with branded templates and default behaviors that perfectly match your store's unique style.
toManage: To manage your plan, please visit the app's plan page.
